total_tools.name: Send Email
total_tools.description: Create and send a new email message

mcp_content.heading: Send New Email Messages
mcp_content.description: Enable your AI agents to compose and send new email messages. This foundational capability allows AI agents to initiate communication, share information, and respond to requests without human intervention.

mcp_content.heading: Remove Unwanted Email Messages
mcp_content.description: Allow your AI agents to delete email messages that are no longer needed. This capability enables inbox management, removal of spam, and maintaining a clean email environment.

mcp_content.heading: Search and Retrieve Email Messages
mcp_content.description: Empower your AI agents to search for and locate specific emails based on various criteria. This powerful search capability enables information retrieval, followup on previous communications, and context-aware responses.

total_tools.name: Reply to Email
total_tools.description: Send a reply to an existing email message

mcp_content.heading: Respond to Existing Email Threads
mcp_content.description: Give your AI agents the ability to reply to email conversations. This maintains the context of ongoing communications and allows for seamless participation in email threads.

mcp_content.heading: Prepare Email Drafts for Review
mcp_content.description: Enable your AI agents to create draft emails that can be reviewed before sending. This allows for human oversight of AI-generated communications while still automating the composition process.

mcp_content.heading: Archive Messages While Preserving Content
mcp_content.description: Allow your AI agents to archive emails, removing them from the inbox while preserving them for future reference. This helps maintain an organized inbox without permanently deleting important correspondence.

total_tools.name: Add Label to Email
total_tools.description: Add a label to an email message

mcp_content.heading: Organize Emails with Categorization
mcp_content.description: Empower your AI agents to apply labels to emails for better organization. This categorization capability allows for structured inbox management, easy filtering, and creating logical groupings of related messages.

total_tools.name: Remove Label From Email
total_tools.description: Remove a label from an email message

mcp_content.heading: Refine Email Organization by Removing Labels
mcp_content.description: Enable your AI agents to remove labels from individual emails. This allows for reorganization, correcting categorization mistakes, and maintaining an accurate classification system.

total_tools.name: Remove Label From Conversation
total_tools.description: Remove a label from all emails within a conversation

mcp_content.heading: Bulk Update Labels Across Conversations
mcp_content.description: Allow your AI agents to remove labels from entire conversation threads at once. This batch operation ensures consistent categorization across related messages and streamlines inbox organization.

mcp_content.heading: Establish New Email Categories
mcp_content.description: Empower your AI agents to create new labels for organizing emails. This allows for dynamic categorization systems that evolve based on changing needs and emerging communication patterns.

total_tools.name: Create Draft Reply
total_tools.description: Create a draft reply to an existing email

mcp_content.heading: Prepare Response Drafts for Review
mcp_content.description: Enable your AI agents to compose draft replies to existing emails that can be reviewed before sending. This combines the context awareness of reply functionality with the safety of human oversight.

total_tools.name: Find or Send Email
total_tools.description: Find an existing email or create and send a new one

mcp_content.heading: Check for Existing Messages Before Sending
mcp_content.description: Give your AI agents the ability to first check if a similar email exists before sending a new one. This prevents duplicate messages and allows for more intelligent communication management.

total_tools.name: List Drafts
total_tools.description: Retrieve a list of all email drafts

mcp_content.heading: Access All Saved Draft Messages
mcp_content.description: Allow your AI agents to retrieve and review all draft emails. This provides visibility into pending communications and enables management of in-progress messages.

total_tools.name: Move to Trash
total_tools.description: Move an email message to the trash folder

mcp_content.heading: Safely Discard Unwanted Messages
mcp_content.description: Enable your AI agents to move emails to trash rather than permanently deleting them. This provides a recovery period for mistakenly removed messages while still cleaning up the inbox.

mcp_content.heading: Access Contact Information
mcp_content.description: Empower your AI agents to retrieve contact details from Gmail. This enables personalized communications, validation of email addresses, and integration with contact management workflows.

total_tools.name: Search Contacts
total_tools.description: Search for contacts matching specific criteria

mcp_content.heading: Find Relevant Contacts by Search
mcp_content.description: Allow your AI agents to search for contacts based on various criteria. This targeted lookup capability enables finding the right people to communicate with for specific tasks or projects.

mcp_content.heading: Remove Unneeded Draft Messages
mcp_content.description: Enable your AI agents to delete draft emails that are no longer needed. This helps keep the drafts folder organized and removes outdated or irrelevant message drafts.

mcp_page_content.title: How Can Your AI Agents Leverage the Gmail MCP Server?
mcp_page_content.description: The Gmail Model Context Protocol (MCP) server empowers your AI agents with direct access to email communication capabilities. Discover how your AI agents can streamline email workflows, from creating and sending messages to organizing, searching, and managing your inbox. Below, explore the specific capabilities and how you can integrate them into your AI agent workflows via MCP for enhanced communication and productivity.
